com.bounswe2015group5.controller

Class TagController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bounswe2015group5.controller.TagController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/tags",
                produces="application/json")
 @Api(description="The tags controller",
     name="Tag Services")
public class TagController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for tag functionality Uses RestController annotation to be treated as a controller. Uses RequestMapping annotation which is treated as ResponseBody semantically.
